sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2012, then it increase greatly by 2013; while Dutch, India, Britain and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2013.
The value of Dutch, America and Japan is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2012, then it increase greatly by 2013; while Dutch, India, Britain and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2013.
The value of Dutch, America and Japan is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.
